thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Dean
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Dean

author: Dean
title: Dean
text: Felicia was our travel consultant who helped plan our Costa Rican vacation and she couldn't have done a better job! Everything worked flawlessly, to the last detail. We talked with her on the phone a few times and she Always answered her phone (no phone tag) and was always quick to respond to an email, if your looking for a vacation in Costa Rica, I highly recommend both!
